definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The breaking surf on the reef is mesmerizing.
sentences.chinese: 拍打在礁石上浪濤聲催人入夢。

sentences.english: Jeff lowered himself to a ledge five feet down and tried to calm them.
sentences.chinese: 傑夫爬下一塊五英尺高的礁石，欲安撫他們。

sentences.english: Reef gaps have marked each of the past five major mass extinctions.
sentences.chinese: 礁石中斷記錄了每一個的過去五年內主要物種的滅絕。

sentences.english: The ship struck the rocks head on .
sentences.chinese: 那隻船迎頭撞上了礁石。

sentences.english: The ship was blowing [blown] towards the rocks.
I unconsciously put my pace slightly and sit cross-legged on her opposite side of the reef.
sentences.chinese: 我不自覺地把腳步放輕，盤腿坐到她對面的礁石上。

sentences.english: I was hiding behind the silversides, low in the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我當時是隱藏在銀河魚後面的礁石間。

sentences.english: The coral insect is daytimeactive, evening hides in the reef crack place rest.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚蟲白天活躍，晚上則躲在礁石的裂縫處休息。

sentences.english: The boat came close to the rocks and then sneered away.
sentences.chinese: 那條船接近了礁石，於是趕忙駛開。

sentences.english: Towards evening， the boat struck a rock and the girl jumped into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 天將黑時，小船撞在了一塊礁石上，姑娘跳進了海里。

sentences.english: Repeated batterings on the rocks had staved in one side of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 接二連三的撞擊礁石使船的一邊撞了一個洞。

sentences.english: The stopping surf on the reef is mesmerizing.
sentences.chinese: 拍打在礁石上浪濤聲催人入夢。

sentences.english: The boat comes close to the rock and then sheers away.
sentences.chinese: 小船快靠近礁石，緊接著轉向行駛。

sentences.english: Only reefs stand alone immutably on the beach after a typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 颱風過後，海灘上只有那些礁石巋然獨存。

sentences.english: The reef top is quite nice with lots of hard coral heads and sandy areas in-between.
sentences.chinese: 礁石頂端是相當不錯的硬珊瑚頭和沙區之間的地段。

sentences.english: The amphitheater-like sandy sea bed is surrounded by coral hillocks and the reef.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚丘和礁石包圍着似圓形劇場的海底沙牀。

definition: sides of a ship/ship's railing/fig. the dividing line between shipboard expenses and onshore freight charges
the bow or prow of a ship
